command.description: Command-line tool to release new versions of composer packages.

option.name: branch
option.description: Remote branch to use for release. If not specified, "master" is used.

option.name: message
option.description: Message to use for the release tag.

option.name: type
option.description: Release type. Must be one of "major", "minor", or "patch". If not specified, "minor" is used. Semver 2.0 (https://semver.org/) is used to pick the next release number.

option.name: verbose
option.description: Sets verbosity level. Use multiples for more detail (e.g. "-vv").

option.name: yes
option.description: Non-interactive mode. Assume yes for prompts.
